ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | deg1propd.b1 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 2 |  | deg1propd.b2 | |- ( ph -> B = ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 3 |  | deg1propd.p | |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. B /\ y e. B ) ) -> ( x ( +g ` R ) y ) = ( x ( +g ` S ) y ) ) |
| 4 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_mdegpropd | |- ( ph -> ( 1o mDeg R ) = ( 1o mDeg S ) ) |
| 5 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` R ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_deg1fval | |- ( deg1 ` R ) = ( 1o mDeg R ) |
| 7 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( deg1 ` S ) = ( deg1 ` S ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_deg1fval | |- ( deg1 ` S ) = ( 1o mDeg S ) |
| 9 | 4, 6, 8 | #P_3eqtr4g | |- ( ph -> ( deg1 ` R ) = ( deg1 ` S ) ) |
